entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
HIGHS AROUND 60

LOWS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
